select wr.id, wr.merchant_id, wr.balance, wr.create_date, wr.audit_status, wr.status_date, mi.name as merchantName, mi.principal, mi.images, mi.phone as merchantPhone, mi.address from withdrawal_record wr left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = wr.merchant_id) where 1 = 1
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{withdrawalRecord.merchantName},'%')
AND wr.audit_status = #{withdrawalRecord.auditStatus}
order by wr.create_date desc
